name: Politicz FighterZ
description:
Politics Fighterz invites you to play as a candidate in the 2022 presidential election in a real fighting game 1 VS 1 where each attack allows you to send a punchline specific to his character.

In this 2D game in side view, with classic fighting mechanics, all the candidates/protagonists fight without mercy in mythical places such as the National Assembly, the Elysée or the Jean-Jacques Bourdin set.

Each attack of the candidates is accompanied by a typical punchline, we can for example observe the famous "The republic is me!" of Jean-Luc Mélenchon or the famous "Ben Voyons" of the candidate Zemmour.

How to play:

This game must be played with keyboard !

keyboard controls player 1: 

JUMP = Z

LEFT = Q

DOWN = S

RIGHT = D

LIGHT ATTACK = C

HEAVY ATTACK = V

BLOCK = B

keyboard controls player 2: 

JUMP = Arrow Up

LEFT = Arrow Left

DOWN = Arrow Down

RIGHT = Arrow Right

LIGHT ATTACK = L

HEAVY ATTACK = M

BLOCK = K
